content: to left needle k4 pattern before you start the cable pattern of these socks tends to draw the fabric in quite severely therefore you definitely need more stitches in the round than for a stockinette sock the smaller size as written should fit legs of 7 to 7 5 circumference the larger size should fit legs of 7 5 to about 8 25 if you want the socks to fit a larger foot use a sock yarn that is on the thicker side of fingering or a light sport weight and knit with a larger needle size in any case make sure to check if the sock fits over the heel as soon as you have completed the first 10 rounds of the leg chart cuff loosely cast on 72 80 sts and join to begin working in the round work k2 p2 ribbing for 12 15 rounds leg start working the leg chart to make symmetrical socks work one of the charts for the first sock the other chart for the second sock work rounds 1-16 of leg pattern 3 times then repeat rounds 1-8 once more set-up for heel flap work 14 10 stitches in 2x2 rib pattern as established then put the next 34 42 sts on hold p ex place them on a piece of waste yarn they will be worked later for instep now count all the stitches that are still sitting on your needles these 38sts are the ones that will be used for the heel flap turn your work so the ws is facing you then work one row like this ws sl yf p2tog ssp2togtbl p1 k2 p2 6times k2 p1 p2tog ssp2togtbl p1 34sts left ©caoua coffee 2014 pattern is for non-commercial personal use only all rights reserved fidelio v 1 page 2/5 fidelio socks -
